title: Coronavirus: Over 10,000 deaths in Italy
description: Coronavirus deaths have now surpassed 10,000 in Italy, with another 889 fatalities on Saturday.  	Yesterday saw Italy record its worst daily death toll, of 969, since the COVID-19 pandemic first began.Â   	Although that figure has dropped to 889 in the last 2…
content:
Coronavirus deaths have now surpassed 10,000 in Italy, with another 889 fatalities on Saturday.
Yesterday saw Italy record its worst daily death toll, of 969, since the COVID-19 pandemic first began. 
Although that figure has dropped to 889 in the last 24 h… [+517 chars]
